data.name: BallRun 3D Marble Maze Speedrun Demo
data.detailed_description:
BallRun is a balance the ball 3D maze. Traverse the maze with up to 100 other ghost players to compete for the top spot in the BallRun leaderboards.

Features:
- realistic physics simulation: no wishy washy floaty gravity stuff here - hard core reflexes required.
- fastest and perfect run (no falls) leaderboards
- race against yourself and up to 100 other leaderboard ghosts
- customization of your ball appearance
- customize maze color

You choose to play BallRun and do the other things, not because it is easy, but because it is hard, because the goal will serve to organize and measure the best BallRunners and their skills, because that challenge is one that you are willing to accept, one you are unwilling to postpone, and one which you intend to win.

data.short_description: BallRun is a balance the ball 3D maze. Traverse the maze with up to 100 other ghost players to compete for the top spot in the BallRun leaderboards. This demo version lets you play the first few stages of the maze and compete in the demo leaderboards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
